snippet.title: Yomi 2 - Official Steam Early Access Release Date | Guerrilla Collective 2023 Showcase
snippet.description:
Yomi 2 will be available in Steam Early Access on June 27, 2023. Watch the trailer for a look at Yomi 2, an upcoming fighting card game. In Yomi 2, pick your character deck, pick a gem to augment them, and fight an opponent. Like in a fighting game, you’ll block high and low attacks, throw overly defensive players, and perform combos of several attacks in a row.

#GameTrailers #SoG #Gaming
